qas.question: When did fighting between Palestinians and the Lebanese begin?
When did US marines land in Lebanon?
When did a suicide bomber successfully attack the marine barracks in Lebanon?
How many marines were killed in the attack?
When did President Reagan withdraw marines from Lebanon?
When did fighting between Palestinians and the Lebanese stop?
When did UK marines land in Lebanon?
When did a suicide bomber successfully attack the marine barracks in China?
How many Africans were killed in the attack?
When did President Bush withdraw marines from Lebanon?

context: In <a0_0><b5_0>1983<b5_0/><a0_0/> fighting between Palestinian refugees and Lebanese factions reignited that nation's long-running civil war. A UN agreement brought an international force of peacekeepers to occupy Beirut and guarantee security. US Marines landed in August <a1_0><b6_0>1982<b6_0/><a1_0/> along with Italian and French forces. On <a2_0><b7_0>October 23, 1983<b7_0/><a2_0/>, a suicide bomber driving a truck filled with 6 tons of TNT crashed through a fence and destroyed the Marine barracks, killing <a3_0><b8_0>241<b8_0/><a3_0/> Marines; seconds later, a second bomber leveled a French barracks, killing 58. Subsequently the US Navy engaged in bombing of militia positions inside Lebanon. While US President Ronald Reagan was initially defiant, political pressure at home eventually forced the withdrawal of the Marines in <a4_0><b9_0>February 1984<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
